review_data.title: Best Bubble Tea in Town
review_data.content: Very nice and helpful staff, great variety of drinks and every tea they brew freshly on spot with a special tea machine! Together with high quality products the matcha latte (vegan version) and jasmin mango berry were super delicious! Thanks to bubblish team, we will...More

review_data.title: Weak tea
review_data.content: Good looking modern shop. Drinks are served in nice sealed cups. However the tea is very weak and taro bubble are a bit too soft / or not freshly prepared. Since the shop is new things might improve over time.
